website_summaries.verdict: Insulated lunch box, part of LunchBlox set of containers and utensils, for the perfectly designed meal away from home.
pros: Space-efficient, insulated box conveniently designed to carry a beverage and utensils
Can be purchased as a set with Modular LunchBlox containers and Blue Ice pack
Lightweight, attractive black-etch exterior, easy-grip handle and detachable shoulder strap
cons: Would be better if there were separate, built-in interior compartments for various items instead of needing to buy modular containers and fit them inside the box

customer_reviews.title: Best lunchbox! Big water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.text: We love this lunchbox! We have had several other ones but this one is the best. Lots of room inside and my favorite part is that the water bottle holder is nice and big. Insulated bottles fit with plenty of room. Took the advice of another review and let my kids color theirs with permanent markers. The lunchbox on the right is actually 3 years old and has held up like a champ (the coloring is not 3 years old). Another plus is the detachable long strap so it can be worn over the shoulder or cross body too.
customer_reviews.author: MomofThree

customer_reviews.title: This lunch box WAS great. It holds my lunch blox containers perfectly and ...
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box WAS great. It holds my lunch blox containers perfectly and holds enough food to last me all day. BUT, today, I looked down and realized the handle was completely frayed off! I bought this earlier this summer but have only used it for 2 weeks of graduate school. This isn't a lunch box that was dragged through the playground or destroyed by a child. My daily five minute walk from the car to my classroom seemingly destroyed this lunch box in 2 weeks of use. I am extremely disappointed and discouraged by the lack of quality. It will not hold up to normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Lizy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for water bottle and lunch kit with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: The medium is the perfect size as it fits an 8 and 1/2in metal water bottle and a lunch kit. There is room left on top of the kit for more food. Im thrilled with the size and shape. I never expect to be able to use the ouside mesh pockets for long because mesh cant last. Ill reinforce with thread the handles as other reviewers have advised. Perfect for my 8yr old. Update one year later. We are using it another school year because it still looks good and is in tact.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: After using this lunch bag less than two weeks, it's coming apart ast the seems. Very disappointing!! Such a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: ebby123

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: First, 5 stars to seller for fast delivery and accurate description. Product is as described. I bought the small size a few yrs ago and love it. Has held up great. So, my bad, did not read description this time and failed to notice linch kit sold separately this time. Darn. Is a little hard to find sizes in my assortment of storage containers that fit well, and my ice blocks don't quite work either. Other bummer is utensil holder is really in wrong direction, unless u have super short handles. Keeping the bag with the hope that we will learn to get along lol.
customer_reviews.author: mcq

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed! Bought it during summer break from school for my son. He picked it for the size and loved it. One week into school and one whole seam that holds the handle broke and now there's a big gaping whole in the lunchbox. Of course my window to return is closed so I'm outta luck on that. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MAUIGOOSE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch bag...but could be better
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this as to carry my daily lunches. At first I thought it was a little big but after buying the containers it is just the right size for the largest interlocking container they have. I say interlocking as I haven't tried many other plastic containers. Hold other things well like mugs, can, PB and Jelly bottles. Pros: Good size to hold for for the entire day. Nice side storage for drinks. Internal mesh pockets hold most utensils Cons: Big for only one meal. Mesh pocket doesn't hold larger utensils. Could be angled differently or replaced with straps.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Our son gives it two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a lunch “system” for our 10 year old who decided that school lunches are “disgusting” (he’s not wrong). I already had the set of Blox that I had been using for my own lunches (teacher, heh) and then saw this offered for just over $8.00. He loves it! Fits just the right amount for his lunch and snack, small bottle of hand sanitizer in one of the inner pockets, and his water bottle in one of the outer pockets... one is actually reinforced at the bottom to hold a bottle. Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cobro

customer_reviews.title: Handy lunch tote
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunch tote. It is just the right size for me. I have not yet gotten into the habit of carrying it regularly but have used it 2 times. It was super convenient. I used it when I was driving support vehicle on a bike ride event. My food was just carrots and PB&J and stayed cool after about 8-10 hours on a blistering hot day. Typically I'd carry it into my office and put it in the fridge, tho. The containers washed easily in the dishwasher. Not really gotten it dirty yet, but it seems like it should wipe clean pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzupergrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy the small
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag and everything, but I am sad, because I order the small hoping it would be good size for my kid's lunch bag.... but it can't even hold their water bottle... it's too small... so best to buy the bigger size.... small is a little bit too small.... but the bag is good and everything....just didn't expect it to be that small. You can buy bigger size if it's for lunch packing purpose dont buy the small size won't hold ur much.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Soft Paw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the Sandwich lunch blox container system and I recommend doing the same if you have it or plan to get it, it holds the containers perfectly and has room to spare for extra snacks a bottled beverage and a slot in the cover for silverware, and then of course outside it has two pockets for bottles. Its perfect for work or even for older kids who may not be rough on their belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: This ripped at the seams as soon as the return window expired. Very shoddy craftsmanship. Hopefully it is just a fluke and other ones have more sturdy needlework. They do clean well (easy to wipe down with wet cloth) and hold rubbermaid lunch boxes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: me123

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this lunch box for my daughter but ended up liking it so much that I purchased another one for myself. I just wish they had different colors of this model. There are two mesh pockets on the inside which I use for my utensils. Additionally, there is a side pocket for a drink. If you use the large entree kit it makes it difficult to put a drink in the side pocket. It fits both size Rubbermaid containers: Rubbermaid LunchBlox Entrée Kit, Green 1806233 Rubbermaid LunchBlox Sandwich Kit, Green 1806231
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new lunch box that would hold my existing dishes and also fit in my backpack. I generally pack light lunches and this is the perfect size. It sees use 5-days a week, has been very durable, and is very easy to clean. Only drawback is the outside pockets are too small for most water bottles. Other than that it is a really good lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Jef Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Sub par quality & durability
customer_reviews.text: Two months after buying both lunch bags have a giant hole ripped right where strap is attached to the body. The stitching just came off and we have two unusable lunch bags now. First time ever a lunch bag hasn’t lasted a school year. Pretty el cheapo quality.
customer_reviews.author: Indio

customer_reviews.title: Good budget lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Pros: affordable, easy access, drink holder on the side is convenient, good handle, good size Cons: limited insulation, I wish there was just a pure black option I have been using this box for months now and it has held up well through daily wear. It works pretty well and is reasonably sized for one mean and a snack. However, it will not retain temperature if left in a hot environment for long (IE inside a car in spring/summer), using multiple ice blocks can help, but contents near the edges will still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jon J.

customer_reviews.title: It's well designed and sized.
customer_reviews.text: It's well designed and sized. It can easily fit a full lunch. The comparability with RubberMaids Bloxs turned out to be a really nice touch. I wasn't even thinking about them until I realized how useful they are for packing a lunch and they just fit right in with plenty of room. I also use a Parent Diary Silicone sandwich box that fits snug but its alright. Here's to hoping it'll hold up. The material quality doesn't "feel" especially good but it isn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kent

customer_reviews.title: Durable !
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son did not want a kiddie lunch box so he picked this one all on his own. Month one of daily school use lunch box still looks brand new. Previously I had to change his lunch boxes every month- this one seems to be holding up. Ill update if it decides to fall part. Edit : lunch box survived until the end of December - it started showing minor signs of fraying around the edges not complete and total death ... four months of 5 days a week use I still feel this is a quality item. Buying a new one and hopefully that makes it to the end of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch bag for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a lunch bag for about a year now, and I finally found the one that was suitable for my needs. I wanted a minimal pattern or plain design, two mesh pockets on the side for my Blender Bottle Go-Stak and the other for my shaker. I also wanted one that would fit my multiple food containers along and reusable snack bags. I have a lot of small meals. This lunch box was a dream! It is perfect and I love that it has an adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Katrine Mendivil

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this lunch bag since over a year and has had no problems carrying more than 4-5 boxes and even fruit or yogurt. It is very spacious and durable. Comes with a sturdy handle and attractive design. It’s been completely leak proof and keeps food hot or cold for longer and has little compartments for cutlery. It comes with a handle and shoulder strap. The only thing that I feel should be improved is stitching the cutlery compartment vertically so that the spoon and fork don’t fall as soon as I open the bag. At just around 10$ I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase again very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these over the last past 4 months and none of them has held up. The handle broke on 2 of the and the water bottle next and the fabric ripped . I am very disappointed and of course it's pass the return date.
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for about a year now and it has held up really well, especially for the price. The strap is detachable and I never use it. You could fit a 20oz bottle standing up inside the bag and still zip it. Not the greatest insulation but it fine for sandwiches and snacks. One drink holder is bigger than the other and will hold my 24oz coffee tumbler, I put my keys in the other one. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Colin.F.703

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box is going on 4th school year with another kid. Zipper still working.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lunchbox for my teenager at the beginning of last school year. He used it all year last year and it is still going strong to start another year. He takes his lunch pretty much everyday and is not super hard on things, but he is a teenager using this daily. I cannot believe it has held up and still the zipper is working great and it looks good. It has plenty of room for a juice box or can, sandwich, small Tupperware or fruit or veggies and a lunch bag of chips. Update bought September 2016, it’s November 2019 lunch box still holding up to daily school use by teen.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I had my kiddos lunch standing upright instead of it laying down and there is a possibility that it would get smashed. It never did with the standing upright lunchbox. Plus we already had some extra Rubbermaid container that would work inside of the lunchbox as well! My kiddo enjoyed it too until he LOST it! Oh well! What can you do, get a new one from them! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an adult-ier lunchbox, and this was as close as I got. It's perfect for what it is advertised as. I think I'm just ready for something even more adult-ier. Perfect little lunchbox, and the pockets on the sides for water bottles were very helpful. Used this to bring drinks on a long road trip. I don't like hard coolers, so this worked.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this product, what you see is what you get. I’ve had coolers that were just way too big for my liking before, but now that I have this, that problem no longer exists. I can fit a sandwich, a portion bag of trail mix, a yogurt tube, and a bottle of Vitamin Water in here comfortably. With a little room left for an apple maybe. The outside pockets I use for miscellaneous items like my sunglasses or my wallet(I carry this on me at work). I am very satisfied with this product, especially when you consider that there doesn’t exist many variety of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice little durable lunchbag for the frugal mature worker.
customer_reviews.text: good deal for using it for work, has held up good and had a good price. Nice item. Great for the guy or gal that has to take quick lunches and very nice for what I needed. Great for the person that just takes quick stuff like canned soup or snacks for lunch, small but big enough for that. Not for the person that brings a three course meal for lunch, but great for the cost conscious and light lunch person. Perfect for the mature worker that doesn't eat heavy lunches, nice storage areas for little snacks and to preserve economically. Nice little item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected for a medium sized lunch bag. Can fit smaller containers and some forks. Best part is the double drink holders on the side. For someone who is a student and rides a scooter to class it comes in handy when I purchase drinks. The cups or bottles fit nice and snug and don’t slip. The front zipper is very handy and makes adding and removing your containers so much easier. Also the handle and over the shoulder strap are very sturdy. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box for commuters
customer_reviews.text: I commute one hour each way to my job and had been eating out way to frequently. I started packing my lunch but struggled to find a lunch box that could fit my food and containers in without a struggle. This works great with the Rubbermaid Lunch Blox System. I can also put my water bottle and blender bottle in and carry everything comfortably. I am excited about packing my lunch with ease. I’m not in love with the design but it’s not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pulfrey

customer_reviews.title: Great size, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is the perfect size. I work 12-hour shifts and pack quite a few reusable plastic containers into it with no issue. The zipper still glides closed perfectly. The material is durable and easy to clean, and the mesh pockets on the side are great for carrying extra items. The items I put into those pouches never fall out.
customer_reviews.author: M & W

customer_reviews.title: Get a better one
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I would not recommend this lunch bag. I'm a college student who spends most of my time at school so I pack a pretty big meal. What I realized was I didn't like how the flap opens from the side; instead I'd prefer to open from up top. Why is that? Because I'd prefer my food to sit rather than stand when I have a big Tupperware that doesn't fit this bag horizontally. I guess it's partly my bad, but who thinks about these things when you choose a lunch bag huh?
customer_reviews.author: Quang Duong

customer_reviews.title: Works well until it went missing
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this lunch box as he wanted something simple. It is sturdy and held up well to middle school boy's abuse and rough use. Sadly after 8 months of ownership, it disappeared from school campus. He likes it so much that we will have to buy it again for him to use for school lunches.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Functional for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Not at all disappointed with this lunch bag. It's a good product at the price point offered. It's not quite leak proof, but it is easy to clean and easy to carry with you without taking up too much space. I was looking for something compact and light and this fit the bill. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch bag especially while using with Lunch Blox
customer_reviews.text: This Rubbermaid lunch Blox lunch bag works perfectly with the lunch Blox system. I highly recommend both the bag and the lunch Blox pieces. My three year old daughter was in a day treatment program where she needed a packed lunch and this system worked great for us. This bag comfortably held the sandwich Blox, two snack Blox, the ice pack, and a sippy cup and granola bar inside. There's also a mesh bottle/can/cup holder on the outside of the bag to hold a a beverage for more storage room inside the bag. I highly recommend this lunch bag, especially for use with the lunch Blox system.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie N

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new lunch box. I like how it opens in The front and I can easily stack the lunch and snacks on top of each other there are convenient mesh compartments on the wall of the front when you unzip perfect for storing utensils or napkins. I used to have the same exact one to bring to work. So there you go it’s a good fit for your kid going to school or an Adult bringing lunch to work.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For Bento Box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunchbox at a very good price! I purchased a bento lunchbox for my son and realized that it wouldn't fit in the superman lunch bag we had purchased for starting school. I was a little worried about purchasing a new one online just in case the dimensions were off but it's perfect. The side pockets are great for his snacks and water bottle and the box is easy to remove. The zipper goes all the way around and doesn't snag on the bag. I place one ice pack inside with the lunch box and it keeps everything cool. Will probably buy another for hubby as he now wants a bento box each day for lunch too.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: A win all around for me!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my food hot or cold or frozen for about 5 hours! Two of the KUUK large (blue) collapsible silicone food containers that I got on Amazon fit perfectly, so there's plenty of room inside for a full lunch and dinner with a couple pieces of fruit sitting on top. And I love the two cup holders! I can put my insulated steel travel mug on one side and my insulated water bottle on the other! They balance each other's weight :) The dual shoulder and handle straps are very convenient. The shoulder strap is wide enough to be very comfortable and the handle strap is nicely padded.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Try it you will like it!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size. They can fit so much in them with out being to huge. We use All reusable containers for packing and a ice pack and everything fits great. We have 2 of them and both kids that use them say they are the best lunch boxes they have had.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for my kids
customer_reviews.text: love love love love this lunch bag. it's a great size since I pack lunches with reusable containers. it perfectly fits containers for a sandwich and fruit, plus more room for snacks. And I love the bottle holder, now our reusable water bottle always comes home instead of getting left behind somewhere. I wish this came is another color (only black). It would be nice if I could distinguish my kids lunch box by color.
customer_reviews.author: LVGS

customer_reviews.title: Simple, light, practical compact lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This my second one. After almost 8 years my first lunch box was ready for a replacement. Great quality, durability and I’ve used it almost every day with my lunches to work. Light, easy to clean and very spacious, with a small ice pack keeps the food fresh until lunch and later, even frozen foods would not thaw... Great buy, I recommend it hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Hector A. Tamburini

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little add on! I got it for my son's daily school lunches and he crams that sucker into his backpack, and so far, so good. It seems to hold its shape pretty well, holds a decent amount of food, the zipper seems solid, and is rugged enough to stand up to a 6th grader's efforts. I'd buy this thing again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura O.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and surprisingly spacious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lunchbox for my husband to take to work. It's inexpensive, lightweight, and surprisingly spacious. It easily fits lunch and snacks for a day at work, and it has both a shoulder strap and a carry handle, as well as two outer mesh pockets for water bottles. So far I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthropod

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold as much as you would think so it holds maybe two bottles three max? The daycare requires four so this doesn’t work for that but it can fit a few smaller baby food containers in it which seems like a waste of space. Buy a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: Original Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good large lunchbox for my boys
customer_reviews.text: My boys like to bring their yumbox for lunch, but we were having hard time fitting the yumbox, ice packs, and water bottle on their bag so I was looking for a lunchbox that would fit them all. This fits the bill. Perfect and they love it. I wish it would come in different design/colors, but my boys like the way it is. Happy kids = happy mom!
customer_reviews.author: arissat

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid product - durable, well made, great value for money. Bought together with the, fits perfectly in this bag. The insulation is not anything to get excited about, but as the lunch kits come with the Blue Ice pack, I don't see it as a problem. I love the narrower, taller shape of this bag, fits nicely inside my Kindergartner's backpack. Zippers have withstood 3 months of daily, 5 yr old pulling/playing. Roomy side pockets are nice for drinks or snacks. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: msrei

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler to fit into diaper bag, bottom of stroller or backpack
customer_reviews.text: Using this cooler for trips with the grandkids to keep our lunch cold. Fits 3 sandwiches, fruit, munchies, etc. Even side pockets for drinks. Also works for me to just take food to a concert in the park, etc. just does not fit the wine bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my 6 year old twins lunch for school. The handle ripped off one of the bags and was hanging by a thread when I picked them up from school. It was the first day they used it. Very upset, now I have to order something else! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.author: Tpena

customer_reviews.title: Strap a Little Short, Otherwise a Great Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: The strap could be a little longer. It's long enough to wear on 1 shoulder, but not quite long enough to wear cross-body (it sits at my waist as opposed to my hips). Perhaps someone smaller than a size 16 won't have this problem. This is an issue for me because things tend to slip off my shoulder. The utensil holders only fits the salad fork and teaspoon from my silverware set (the dinner fork and tablespoon do not fit). Other than that, there's plenty of room for my Pyrex containers and I love the bottle holders on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: great price and good size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lunch bag for my boy something small where I can put snacks and his bottle of water and that he can carry if he goes on school trip. It is just what I was looking for it has solid straps, mesh for bottles and good size for the inside snack or sandwich or fruits and inside pockets or forks or napkins. great price !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunchbag. It is actually kids size as far as the cross over the body handle but the lunch bag itself works perfectly well for me. I don't usually take big lunches to work so this one does it for me. I like the side pockets bc it can hold my drinks right side up. The only thing i don't like is that all the handles that the cross body belt is in are all plastic so it could easily break over time but no worries if it does i can always fix it and put steel handles which will work better than the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for the person who takes salads every day
customer_reviews.text: Get this with the Rubbermaid salad boxes, and it fits perfectly with room for snacks throughout the day. A great system for those who like things that provide portion control. Great to hold waters on the side. I always had issues with lunch boxes that never had room for my water bottle. love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn.House

customer_reviews.title: nice, bigger lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This lunchbox is great for my middle schooler. Her appetite is bigger than my elementary school-aged kids, so I needed a bigger lunchbox. This has a nice big base and holds her full sandwich-sized containers. Plus we love the external bottle holder, as we never seem to have room inside lunchboxes for water bottles. We don't use the LunchBlox containers, but this seems to work well with all sorts of containers much easier than a traditional lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school kids...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had a lot of lunch bags with the new school year. I bought a lot of Rubbermaid Lunch Blox and needed room. This has been working like a dream! I can place her thermos inside or use one of the two outer mesh pockets. The handle is very comfortable in my hands. She likes wearing it with the strap wrapped around her like a purse. I did not expect for the price for this to be so nice. There is not a label inside to write a name but I wrote it on the inner interior as you open it to show my daughter’s name. It looks great and has not come off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great backup
customer_reviews.text: So I got this as a replacement lunchbox when my son lost his. It’s big enough for an adult to use which is not bad at all. The design is mutual and my son rather use this one since finding his other one.
customer_reviews.author: Zavi's Mami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son goes to a daycare center that requires the parents to provide all of the food and drinks for your child. I previously had a bulkier lunchbox and I wanted to down grade the size. This is perfect! It holds his required 3 daily drinks, tons of snack options, ice packs, and his lunch. It keeps his lunch cold and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good lunchbox for the price. It's deeper than I expected and bigger than I needed but the soft covering allows me to flatten it a little to fit in the front pocket of my son's backpack. He already has so much to carry in that, I was a little worried the lunch bag would not fit. If you pack a lot of containers in the lunch box, this is probably perfect. I wish there were some plain color options but the black and white design is neutral enough for a middle school boy.
customer_reviews.author: JABA4

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with my lunch box the only thing is 1 of the zippers keep getting stuck. I only had lunch box almost 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rita0512

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing but good value and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the shoulder strap, which was the main reason I bought this product. I wanted something that was convenient and would let me be hands free since I have to carry a heavy backpack and water bottle. Unfortunately the shoulder strap doesn't stay on my shoulder like I wanted (it kept sliding off), so I have to wear it cross body style which is a little uncomfortable over my backpack. Overall, good value and I like the size, it easily fits a lot of tupperware and snacks. I like the fact that it has space for a water bottle too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: My son has a long day at school and this fits his lunch and all of his snacks. It’s a little bigger than the average school lunchbox, so I don’t have to struggle to cram everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: thomas flowers

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lunch box that I could take to work with me. I didn't want anything massive, nor did I want anything tiny, and it seemed there was no middle ground in the lunch box world. When I found this, it was obvious that many were purchasing it for their kids or teenagers. That made me a bit iffy, but I took the plunge. I'm glad I did. It's great quality and exactly what I'm looking for. My containers fit perfectly, there is a place for my drink bottle, another pocket for my wallet and phone while on lunch, and a shoulder strap to keep my hands free. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunch
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new bag for lunch. This does the job. Nothing fancy, simple and works. Big enough to fit everything but at the same time not too big or bulky. Small thing I like a lot. It has a handle or a belt to carry over your shoulder - whatever is easier for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband so he can take lunch to work. He absolutely love it. Keeps his lunch cold while he’s in the motor pool all day, fits 2 “small” bento boxes (the pink and tan ones I bought) with an ice pack. Or it also fits the steel bento box I just bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch boxes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lunch boxes for my kids because I bought the rubber maid lunch kit these lunch boxes are great they hold the kit plus there's extra room for other stuff .
customer_reviews.author: stepahnie jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lunch bag :)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Not cheap material. Nice design. My teenager son picked it out & uses it every school day
customer_reviews.author: Blessedredhead

customer_reviews.title: Huge capacity
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. It looks small when I got it so I was disappointed. But when I started to pack food in it, I realised it actually had a huge capacity. I can put two lunch boxes, fruit, and some snacks in it. There are small pockets inside and two side pockets for water bottles as well. My husband and I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Ke Li

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty! Great lunch box for adults or children..I was able to fit a ton of goodies and a sandwich inside. The side pockets are a life saver and give you a ton of extra room!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but too small for a real lunch
customer_reviews.text: So tiny! Maybe it's good for kids? If you're ok using the tiny tiny LunchBlox, then this will work for you. But if you eat more than 3 pieces of pasta at lunch, this will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: No Blox
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the food containers. But it does fit both Cal Tiffin oval and square stainless steel 2 compartment containers. Only problem I have is, the bag my son had before this one was a top opening/fold over insulated kids lunch bag. It practically closed itself. This bag sometimes comes home half zipped with stuff wanting to tumble out.
customer_reviews.author: mezajt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good product! Bought this to replace my sons lunchbox so far its withstanded everything and keeps his lunch cold. They have multiple meshlike pockets on the inside and capable of holding more than one small sized ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for lunch and snacks
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old needed a larger lunch box than the typical ones for kids so I cold pack healthy snacks like fruit and veggies for summer camp. This bag is perfect! And even cleaned up well when he spilled dressing all inside lol. A good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for its designed use. It looks cute, has little weight, and fits my lunchblox perfectly. I carry food with me all the time, and this is the best solution I've found. I use one blue ice sandwiched between a container below, and as many of the smaller containers as I need (up to four) plugged into the top indents on the blue ice (designed for the lunchblox units). It works really well, and keeps the food remarkably cold. When I've carried ice packs in the past, anything I tried added too much weight. This is a great solution. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: BarbZ

customer_reviews.title: great solution to school lunch dread!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the lunch blox kits! We have the small and large kits and bags for each of our kids. They are affordable, easy to use and completely secure. Kids under 6 may have a small issue with opening the actual kits due to how well they are leak proof. The included ice packs (in the lunch kits...sorry in a hurry so copying and pasting my review on the different products) really do stay ice cold. The lunches have come home still cold even after the 7 hour school day....hot lunches are still warm. My kids love that the handles are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Lish

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect. bought the rubbermaid sandwich lunch kit to go with it. love the ice pack with the sandwich kit that snaps on. the lunch box is waterproof and insulated so can go in backpack with books. It has enough room for plastic containers, spoon, hand sanitizer wipe, and napkin.
customer_reviews.author: eskimodoc

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's extremely ugly-- the print is no good, but it's big enough for taking a lot of food to work, easy to wipe out. I got it because it was recommended by The Wirecutter
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This lunchbox is great! I was struggling to find a decent one and then I found this one! It's in perfect condition and it keeps all of my food at a nice temperature, and it's easy to carry around all day (I use it for school) I highly recommend this lunchbox! It's also very spacious and you can even store two drinks on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Willett

customer_reviews.title: This is the PERFECT size for my hubby
customer_reviews.text: I bought another lunch bag for him prior to this one. It was nice, but huge! This one is just right, that is, with the Lunch Blox containers packed snugly within. In my opinion, the containers make this the perfect lunch box. I can stack several inside and they fit like a dream. I usually pack a sandwich, salad, salad dressing, pineapple chunks, applesauce, an apple and yogurt. It is quite full and I am not sure if I could get more than that inside of it. My husband loves that he isn't carrying a suitcase to work and he doesn't mind the pattern on it either. 5 happy stars!
customer_reviews.author: sychedbyrain

customer_reviews.title: Cool Enough for High School
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the blox containers. My 17 year old son uses it to carry lunch to school. It doesn't look uncool, and has withstood the first semester without a blemish (a first in lunch boxes for him!). He can get enough variety and volume in the box to fill him up during the day, not an easy task when you are talking about a 6 foot tall eating machine!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Keys

customer_reviews.title: Style works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 star only because the zippers are rather awkward - they don’t zip easily around the curved edges but overall the product keeps my lunch cool til lunchtime with a thin cool pack and the size fits my salad in the bottom and smaller items stacked accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Pam Tiemann

customer_reviews.title: Great for bringing lunch to work
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for a work lunch bag, I use it everyday. Today I had one of those plastic rectangle Chinese food containers, 2 cans, and a yogurt in there with room to spare. Unless you eat A LOT, it has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal For The Price, Handles Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: For $10, you can't beat this. The small version of this has a very spacious interior. This box keeps the cold within itself. Very little of the cold escapes from this lunch box. I was able to fit around 4 ice blocks, a bag, a drink, and two sakes in this lunch box. However, one of my complaints for this lunch bag is that the threading around the handles isn't exactly that durable. I noticed that after occasional use, the handle is beginning to wear and the threads are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Choose the right container.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and I love that it comes with a shoulder strap, however be mindful about the containers. It should be used with leak proof containers that are also square/rectangle shaped so it fits properly inside. Mine got stained after a few weeks of use and after a month and half of use part of the sewing broke.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected based on information listed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the dimensions listed on amazon, but the dimensions are inaccurate, or possibly for the inside of the lunch box. I'm not sure. If you need a large lunch box, this will work well for you, but I was looking for a box that I could toss in my back pack, and this one would not fit, so I returned it and got the smaller one. The smaller one holds temperature well, so I imagine this one will as well. It's just too big for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: NICE! BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, this particular lunch bag that I received it has a a smell that I don’t know if it’s from the fabric materials. I will try to wash it and if the odor continues I will return it
customer_reviews.author: Gus Klro

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality wish it was a tad bit more deeper
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality wish it was a tad bit more deeper, that is why the 4 stars. Have used it pretty much everyday for my toddler & can clean it in a jiffy!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Lunch Box Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 4 years or so now and I still use it every day to take lunch to work. Nice design, no rips or tears after all this time, can fit bottles in both side pockets even though it is obvious only the right side is meant to hold a bottle. Nice place on the inside of the flap to store napkins and silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: Great shape and size allows easy packing; shoulder strap is very useful
customer_reviews.text: Great size and shape, and love that a strap comes with it. The shape and full zipper lets you arrange everything in the lunchbox, instead of needing to stack things on top of eachother as you load your food into it. It makes it much easier when you carry softer items that you need to make sure aren't crushed.
customer_reviews.author: shweenz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the kids lunch blox set!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son uses this for his lunch along with the kids lunch blox set. The Lunch Blox fit perfectly inside with a little space for extras. I can fit a small lunch size chip bag on top of the blox. There are two pockets as well that fit his plastic ware and napkin perfectly. There are also two pockets on the side for water bottles or other drinks. There is a handle on top but also an adjustable strap for shoulder carrying. This is a great, durable lunch bag that works GREAT with the Lunch Blox kids set.
customer_reviews.author: Kara P.

customer_reviews.title: Great system, but bag broke after two months use
customer_reviews.text: Love! My son is so much happier with his lunches. The LunchBlock Sandwich kit fits perfectly, with plenty of room left for an apple and and additional snack. The mesh areas on the side are large enough to comfortably fit a water bottle. Best lunch bag I have every bought! Edited 10/14/15 – I still love this system, but am very disappointed that the bag did not last. After two months of use, the top strap broke. I expected the bag to last longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch kit!
customer_reviews.text: I like this adult's lunch kit very well, with the proviso that the actual set of containers is sold separately, and you will need the set offered with it. But the sack itself is well designed, and the available set of containers fits perfectly. It opens wide, and easily admits the plastic containers, which set securely inside. And, if you purchase both sets, you will be able to carry any combination of foods with you. This kit also features a shoulder strap, and nice, mature styling.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: After a month long search I found the perfect lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch box! I literally looked around for over a month to find the perfect lunch box and this one was it. I like that it has the rubbermaid containers that can fit perfectly in there and they have different sizes that snap together. It has been great for other containers as well. I shop at Costco and they have disposable black and clear containers that fit in this perfectly as well. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: brayk

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is one great lunch bag. Finally something that isn't too boxy or bulky but still very spacious. My husband is very picky about his lunch boxes but he is using it, so i call it success! The side pocket fits his slim travel mug. What else do you need? update 8/2015: the lunch bag is going strong, i still love it, but my husband thinks it's not manly enough. he calls it a murse (man's purse). what i like best about this bag is that it even fits the rubbermaid plastic square bowls too, but i'm still looking for a better, more manly lunch bag *sighs*.
customer_reviews.author: imprudentme

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I Love this lunch box. Perfect sized for one person's food. And there are two mesh holders on the side so I don't have to juggle all my bottles anymore! I like the pouches in the inside to so it holds cutlery and napkins. The strap is adjustable or removable to use the carry handle only.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this lunch box! Plenty of room for all of his goodies. Holds up very well. This is the second one I have purchased in the past couple of years. He is typically very hard on his lunch boxes and we were buying a new one every couple of months. This one has lasted much longer. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsee Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great pick
customer_reviews.text: Great for school lunches. Those ones that come with the book bags are so small. He loves this and it has plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: N. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough to fit a full sized glass lunch box but it’s a tight fit. For just sandwiches and snacks is ok. I always put water bottles in side netting.
customer_reviews.author: Malagabee

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell if it's sturdy enough for him with every day use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who packs lunch for work. This one is roomy enough to carry a fairly large salad bowl with an apple, a yogurt and a drink as well as the slot on the side for a water bottle. Time will tell if it's sturdy enough for him with every day use, but so far so good. He's happy it fits everything he needs for the day.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Fit the rubbermaid food storage in there easily with a bottle of water with room to spare ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bulky at all. Fit the rubbermaid food storage in there easily with a bottle of water with room to spare for baggies of veggies, etc. If you need to fill the bag, then there are always two deep pockets on the sides (outside of bag) for bottles, etc. I have used this and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch-box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box, the size, the water bottle spots, and the little area for napkins/silverware are all great!! It’s so hard to find a lunch box that fits all sorts of containers, but this one does! It even fits our bentgo boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon prime member

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the purchase but it ripped within two weeks of use ☹️. I did not even put anything heavy in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid won't let you down, but its not as flxible as it could be.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to grab a few of the Rubbermaid Lunch Box kits to go with this, because the size/shape does not comform well to other meal/bento boxes. It is good quality though and works well with the specified boxes.
customer_reviews.author: CavalierX

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid LunchBlox Lunch Bag, Medium, Black Etch
product_meta.description: Size:Medium| Style Name:Black Etch Lunch BagTake a healthy lunch anywhere in style with this medium black etch Rubbermaid LunchBlox Lunch Bag. Specifically designed to work with Rubbermaid LunchBlox containers, it efficiently packs multiple containers along with a frozen Blue Ice pack to keep Contents fresher and more flavorful longer. A bottle holder and utensil/accessory compartment keep everything you need for a delicious lunch handy. This lightweight bag features a convenient comfort grip handle and removable shoulder strap. LunchBlox containers, ice packs, water bottle, and utensils not included. Measures 5.4" L x 8.8" W x 8.9" H; 7.2 ounces.
feature_bullets: Specifically designed to work with rubbermaid lunchblox food containers and blue ice packs; Insulated to keep food fresher longer
Lightweight lunch bag with zip closure is easy to carry with comfort grip handle and removable shoulder strap
Includes specific compartments for bottles and utensils
LunchBlox containers, water bottles, utensils, and blue ice packs sold separately

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,702 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
